page.title: 05SHIPSTON DRAMATIC SOCIETY
page.content: In November 1954,the{Shipston-on- {Stour Dramatic Society}was restarted after a lapse of fifteen years.They perform at the Townshend Hall.Plays and pantomimes are performed every year.There is also a Youth Theatre Group. { Roger Hume,}a professional actor, has lived in Shipston-on-Stour nearly all his life.He started with small parts in Dramatic Society productions.He now has four one-man shows and has performed them at Windsor Castle,and has toured America and Australia.He is also frequently seen on television. We asked people in the town centre about the{Arts.}30% attend Dramatic Society performances,44% visit the Theatre elsewhere,59% go to concerts, 11% go to Opera,11% to Ballet and 33% visit picture galleries.
